data.qoute: A leader leads with example... Whether he intends to or not.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: A path is formed by walking.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute:
A problem is a problem only when you think it is a problem.
 In the perspective of your Soul, every problem is an opportunity to achieve a Higher Consciousness.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Act boldly and unforeseen forces will come to your aid.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Align your focus with the solution and not the problem.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: All our dreams can come true... if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute:
An arrow can only be shot by pulling it backward.
 When life is dragging you back with difficulties, it  means it's going to launch you into something great.
 So just focus and keep aiming.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Be all that you can be.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Big shots are... little shots who keep on shooting.
data.author: Unknown
